Sentencas: Among high temperature fuel cells, solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) possess several advantages such as fuel flexibility, high power density, and high-quality waste heat for cogeneration applications.
Titulo: Development of a self-sustaining kWe-class integrated diesel fuel processing system for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, if the reformates of hydrocarbon fuel are used to operate SOFCs, sulfur poisoning and carbon deposition is observed.
Titulo: Development of a self-sustaining kWe-class integrated diesel fuel processing system for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Diesel reformate contains sulfur compounds and residual low-molecular-weight (LMW) hydrocarbons, which are formed on the anode of the SOFC.
Titulo: Development of a self-sustaining kWe-class integrated diesel fuel processing system for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this study, a new type of diesel fuel processing system was introduced for the stable operation of SOFCs.
Titulo: Development of a self-sustaining kWe-class integrated diesel fuel processing system for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The novel diesel fuel processor contains three different reaction stages: autothermal reforming (ATR), adsorptive desulfurization, and post-reforming.
Titulo: Development of a self-sustaining kWe-class integrated diesel fuel processing system for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: For the stable operationfof SOFCs, the desulfurization and post-reforming processes are used to eliminate sulfur compounds and residual light hydrocarbons from the diesel reformate.
Titulo: Development of a self-sustaining kWe-class integrated diesel fuel processing system for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The proposed fuel processor does not require an additional heat exchanger or electrical equipment for the supply of heat or the vaporization of fuel and water.
Titulo: Development of a self-sustaining kWe-class integrated diesel fuel processing system for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The integrated reactor can be implemented as a self-sustaining reactor due to the exothermic nature of the ATR reaction.
Titulo: Development of a self-sustaining kWe-class integrated diesel fuel processing system for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The reaction temperature of desulfurization and post-reforming processes are controlled by the arrangement of the reactors and heat exchange through the integrated reactor.
Titulo: Development of a self-sustaining kWe-class integrated diesel fuel processing system for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The kW, self-sustaining integrated diesel fuel processor was operated for approximately 1000 h, and a reforming efficiency of 60% was achieved.
Titulo: Development of a self-sustaining kWe-class integrated diesel fuel processing system for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Moreover, the desulfurizer and post-reforming reactor completely removed H2S and light hydrocarbons from the diesel reformate.
Titulo: Development of a self-sustaining kWe-class integrated diesel fuel processing system for solid oxide fuel cells
